00050 template <unsigned R, unsigned C> 
00051 class MsqMatrix
00052 {
00053 protected:
00054   double m[R*C];
00055 
00056 public:
00057   typedef MsqMatrix<R,C> my_type;
00058   
00059   enum { ROWS = R, COLS = C };
00060 
00062   MsqMatrix()                                         { }
00064   MsqMatrix( double v )                               { diag(v); }
00066   MsqMatrix( const double* v )                        { set(v); }
00068   MsqMatrix( const double v[R][C] )                   { set(v); }
00070   MsqMatrix( const MsqMatrix<R,1>* c )                { set_columns(c); }
00072   MsqMatrix( const MsqMatrix<1,C>* r )                { set_rows(r); }
00074   MsqMatrix( const char* s )                          { set(s); }
00076   MsqMatrix( const std::string& s )               { set(s); }
00081   MsqMatrix( const MsqMatrix<R+1,C+1>& m, unsigned r, unsigned c )
00082                                                       { make_minor(m,r,c); }
00083   
00084   MsqMatrix<R,C>& operator=( double v )                 { set(v); return *this; }
00085   MsqMatrix<R,C>& operator=( const double* v )          { set(v); return *this; }
00086   MsqMatrix<R,C>& operator=( const char* s )            { set(s); return *this; }
00087   MsqMatrix<R,C>& operator=( const std::string& s ) { set(s); return *this; }
00088   
00089   double& operator()( unsigned r, unsigned c )        { return m[r*C+c]; }
00090   double  operator()( unsigned r, unsigned c ) const  { return m[r*C+c]; }
00091   double* data()                                      { return m; }
00092   const double* data() const                          { return m; }
00093   
00094   void zero()                                         { set(0.0);  }
00095   void identity()                                     { diag(1.0); }
00096   void set( double v )        { for (unsigned i = 0; i < R*C; ++i) m[i] = v; }
00097   void set( const double* v ) { for (unsigned i = 0; i < R*C; ++i) m[i] = v[i]; }
00098   void set( const double v[R][C] );
00099   void set( const char* s )   { std::istringstream i(s); i >> *this; }
00100   void set( const std::string& s ) { set( s.c_str() ); }
00102   inline void diag( double v );
00104   inline void diag( const double* v );
00106   inline void make_minor( const MsqMatrix<R+1,C+1>& m, unsigned r, unsigned c );
00107   
00109   inline MsqMatrix<R,C>& assign_add_transpose( const MsqMatrix<C,R>& other );
00111   inline MsqMatrix<R,C>& assign_product( double s, const MsqMatrix<R,C>& m );
00113   inline MsqMatrix<R,C>& assign_add_product( double s, const MsqMatrix<R,C>& m );
00115   inline MsqMatrix<R,C>& assign_multiply_elements( const MsqMatrix<R,C>& m );
00116   
00117   inline MsqMatrix<R,C>& operator+=( const MsqMatrix<R,C>& other );
00118   inline MsqMatrix<R,C>& operator-=( const MsqMatrix<R,C>& other );
00119   inline MsqMatrix<R,C>& operator+=( double scalar );
00120   inline MsqMatrix<R,C>& operator-=( double scalar );
00121   inline MsqMatrix<R,C>& operator*=( double scalar );
00122   inline MsqMatrix<R,C>& operator/=( double scalar );
00123   
00124   //      MsqMatrix<1,C>& row( unsigned r )       { return *(MsqMatrix<1,C>*)(m+C*r); }
00125   //const MsqMatrix<1,C>& row( unsigned r ) const { return *(MsqMatrix<1,C>*)(m+C*r); }

00140 template <> 
00141 class MsqMatrix<1,1>
00142 {
00143 protected:
00144   double m;
00145 
00146 public:
00147   typedef MsqMatrix<1,1> my_type;
00148   
00149   enum { ROWS = 1, COLS = 1 };
00150 
00152   MsqMatrix()                                         { }
00154   MsqMatrix( double v )                               : m(v) {}
00156   MsqMatrix( const double* v )                        : m(*v) {}
00158   MsqMatrix( const char* s )                          { set(s); }
00160   MsqMatrix( const std::string& s )               { set(s); }
00165   MsqMatrix( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& M, unsigned r, unsigned c ) :  m(M(r,c)) {}
00166   
00167   MsqMatrix<1,1>& operator=( double v )                 { m = v; return *this; }
00168   MsqMatrix<1,1>& operator=( const double* v )          { m = *v; return *this; }
00169   MsqMatrix<1,1>& operator=( const char* s )            { set(s); return *this; }
00170   MsqMatrix<1,1>& operator=( const std::string& s ) { set(s); return *this; }
00171   
00172   double& operator()( unsigned, unsigned )        { return m; }
00173   double  operator()( unsigned, unsigned ) const  { return m; }
00174   double* data()                                      { return &m; }
00175   const double* data() const                          { return &m; }
00176   
00177   void zero()                                         { m = 0.0; }
00178   void identity()                                     { m = 1.0; }
00179   void set( double v )        { m = v; }
00180   void set( const double* v ) { m= *v; }
00181   void set( const char* s )   { std::istringstream i(s); i >> m; }
00182   void set( const std::string& s ) { set( s.c_str() ); }
00184   inline void diag( double v ) { m = v; }
00186   inline void diag( const double* v ) { m = *v; }
00188   inline void make_minor( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& M, unsigned r, unsigned c )
00189     { m = M(r,c); }
00190   
00192   inline MsqMatrix<1,1>& assign_add_transpose( const MsqMatrix<1,1>& other )
00193     { m += other.m; return *this; }
00195   inline MsqMatrix<1,1>& assign_product( double s, const MsqMatrix<1,1>& other )
00196     { m = s*other.m; return *this; }
00198   inline MsqMatrix<1,1>& assign_add_product( double s, const MsqMatrix<1,1>& other )
00199     { m += s*other.m; return *this; }
00201   inline MsqMatrix<1,1>& assign_multiply_elements( const MsqMatrix<1,1>& other )
00202     { m *= other.m; return *this; }
00203     
00204   operator double () const
00205     { return m; }
00206 };

00215 {
00216 public:

00221   MsqVector( const std::string& s )               { MsqMatrix<L,1>::set(s); }
00222   MsqVector( const MsqMatrix<L,1>& m) : MsqMatrix<L,1>(m) {}
00223   
00224   double& operator[](unsigned idx)                    { return MsqMatrix<L,1>::operator()(idx,0); }
00225   double  operator[](unsigned idx) const              { return MsqMatrix<L,1>::operator()(idx,0); }
00226   double& operator()(unsigned idx)                    { return MsqMatrix<L,1>::operator()(idx,0); }
00227   double  operator()(unsigned idx) const              { return MsqMatrix<L,1>::operator()(idx,0); }
00228 
00229   MsqVector<L>& operator=( const MsqMatrix<L,1>& m )
00230     { MsqMatrix<L,1>::operator=(m); return *this; }
00231 };

00239 template <unsigned R, unsigned C>
00240 class MsqMatrixA : public MsqMatrix<R,C>
00241 {
00242 public:
00244   MsqMatrixA()                                         { MsqMatrix<R,C>::set(0); }
00246   MsqMatrixA( double v )                               { MsqMatrix<R,C>::set(v); }
00247   MsqMatrixA( const double* v )                        { MsqMatrix<R,C>::set(v); }
00248   MsqMatrixA( const char* s )                          { MsqMatrix<R,C>::set(s); }
00249   MsqMatrixA( const std::string& s )               { MsqMatrix<R,C>::set(s); }
00250   MsqMatrixA( const MsqMatrix<R,C>& m) : MsqMatrix<R,C>(m) {}
00251   MsqMatrixA( const MsqMatrix<R+1,C+1>& m, unsigned r, unsigned c )
00252                                                        { MsqMatrix<R,C>::make_minor(m,r,c); }
00253   
00254   double* operator[]( unsigned idx )                  { return MsqMatrix<R,C>::m+C*idx;  }
00255   const double* operator[]( unsigned idx ) const      { return MsqMatrix<R,C>::m+C*idx;  }
00256 
00257   MsqMatrixA<R,C>& operator=( const MsqMatrixA<R,C>& m )
00258     { MsqMatrixA<R,C>::operator=(m); return *this; }
00259 };

00261 template <unsigned R, unsigned C> inline
00262 void MsqMatrix<R,C>::set( const double v[R][C] )
00263 {
00264   for (unsigned r = 0; r < R; ++r)
00265     for (unsigned c = 0; c < C; ++c)
00266       operator()(r,c) = v[r][c];
00267 }
00268 
00269 template <unsigned R, unsigned C> inline
00270 void MsqMatrix<R,C>::diag( double v ) {
00271   //for (unsigned r = 0; r < R; ++r)
00272   //  for (unsigned c = 0; c < C; ++c)
00273   //    operator()(r,c) = (r == c) ? v : 0.0;
00274 
00275   switch (R) {
00276     default: for (unsigned r = 4; r < R; ++r)
00277       switch (C) {
00278         default: for (unsigned k = 4; k < C; ++k)
00279                    operator()(r,k) = r == k ? v : 0.0;
00280         case 4:    operator()(r,3) = 0.0;
00281         case 3:    operator()(r,2) = 0.0;
00282         case 2:    operator()(r,1) = 0.0;
00283         case 1:    operator()(r,0) = 0.0;
00284       }
00285     case 4:
00286       switch (C) {
00287         default: for (unsigned k = 4; k < C; ++k)
00288                    operator()(3,k) = 0.0;
00289         case 4:    operator()(3,3) = v;
00290         case 3:    operator()(3,2) = 0.0;
00291         case 2:    operator()(3,1) = 0.0;
00292         case 1:    operator()(3,0) = 0.0;
00293       }
00294     case 3:
00295       switch (C) {
00296         default: for (unsigned k = 4; k < C; ++k)
00297                    operator()(2,k) = 0.0;
00298         case 4:    operator()(2,3) = 0.0;
00299         case 3:    operator()(2,2) = v;
00300         case 2:    operator()(2,1) = 0.0;
00301         case 1:    operator()(2,0) = 0.0;
00302       }
00303     case 2:
00304       switch (C) {
00305         default: for (unsigned k = 4; k < C; ++k)
00306                    operator()(1,k) = 0.0;
00307         case 4:    operator()(1,3) = 0.0;
00308         case 3:    operator()(1,2) = 0.0;
00309         case 2:    operator()(1,1) = v;
00310         case 1:    operator()(1,0) = 0.0;
00311       }
00312     case 1:
00313       switch (C) {
00314         default: for (unsigned k = 4; k < C; ++k)
00315                    operator()(0,k) = 0.0;
00316         case 4:    operator()(0,3) = 0.0;
00317         case 3:    operator()(0,2) = 0.0;
00318         case 2:    operator()(0,1) = 0.0;
00319         case 1:    operator()(0,0) = v;
00320       }
00321   }
00322 }
00323 
00324 template <unsigned R, unsigned C> inline
00325 void MsqMatrix<R,C>::diag( const double* v ) {
00326   //for (unsigned r = 0; r < R; ++r)
00327   //  for (unsigned c = 0; c < C; ++c)
00328   //    operator()(r,c) = (r == c) ? v[r] : 0.0;
00329 
00330   switch (R) {
00331     default: for (unsigned r = 4; r < R; ++r)
00332       switch (C) {
00333         default: for (unsigned k = 4; k < C; ++k)
00334                    operator()(r,k) = r == k ? v[r] : 0.0;
00335         case 4:    operator()(r,3) = 0.0;
00336         case 3:    operator()(r,2) = 0.0;
00337         case 2:    operator()(r,1) = 0.0;
00338         case 1:    operator()(r,0) = 0.0;
00339       }
00340     case 4:
00341       switch (C) {
00342         default: for (unsigned k = 4; k < C; ++k)
00343                    operator()(3,k) = 0.0;
00344         case 4:    operator()(3,3) = v[3];
00345         case 3:    operator()(3,2) = 0.0;
00346         case 2:    operator()(3,1) = 0.0;
00347         case 1:    operator()(3,0) = 0.0;
00348       }
00349     case 3:
00350       switch (C) {
00351         default: for (unsigned k = 4; k < C; ++k)
00352                    operator()(2,k) = 0.0;
00353         case 4:    operator()(2,3) = 0.0;
00354         case 3:    operator()(2,2) = v[2];
00355         case 2:    operator()(2,1) = 0.0;
00356         case 1:    operator()(2,0) = 0.0;
00357       }
00358     case 2:
00359       switch (C) {
00360         default: for (unsigned k = 4; k < C; ++k)
00361                    operator()(1,k) = 0.0;
00362         case 4:    operator()(1,3) = 0.0;
00363         case 3:    operator()(1,2) = 0.0;
00364         case 2:    operator()(1,1) = v[1];
00365         case 1:    operator()(1,0) = 0.0;
00366       }
00367     case 1:
00368       switch (C) {
00369         default: for (unsigned k = 4; k < C; ++k)
00370                    operator()(0,k) = 0.0;
00371         case 4:    operator()(0,3) = 0.0;
00372         case 3:    operator()(0,2) = 0.0;
00373         case 2:    operator()(0,1) = 0.0;
00374         case 1:    operator()(0,0) = v[0];
00375       }
00376   }
00377 }
00378 
00384 template <unsigned R, unsigned C> inline
00385 void MsqMatrix<R,C>::make_minor( const MsqMatrix<R+1,C+1>& M, unsigned r, unsigned c )
00386 {
00387   for (unsigned i = 0; i < r; ++i) {
00388     for (unsigned j = 0; j < c; ++j)
00389       operator()(i,j) = M(i,j);
00390     for (unsigned j = c; j < C; ++j)
00391       operator()(i,j) = M(i,j+1);
00392   }
00393   for (unsigned i = r; i < R; ++i) {
00394     for (unsigned j = 0; j < c; ++j)
00395       operator()(i,j) = M(i+1,j);
00396     for (unsigned j = c; j < C; ++j)
00397       operator()(i,j) = M(i+1,j+1);
00398   }
00399 }

00402 void MsqMatrix<R,C>::set_row( unsigned r, const MsqMatrix<1,C>& v )

00410 template <unsigned R, unsigned C> inline

00423 template <unsigned R, unsigned C> inline

00428 template <unsigned R, unsigned C> inline
00429 MsqMatrix<R,1> MsqMatrix<R,C>::column( unsigned c ) const
00430 {
00431   MsqMatrix<R,1> result;
00432   for (unsigned i = 0; i < R; ++i)
00433     result(i,0) = operator()(i,c);
00434   return result;
00435 }
00436 
00437 template <unsigned R, unsigned C> inline
00438 MsqMatrix<1,R> MsqMatrix<R,C>::column_transpose( unsigned c ) const
00439 {
00440   MsqMatrix<1,R> result;
00441   for (unsigned i = 0; i < R; ++i)
00442     result(0,i) = operator()(i,c);
00443   return result;
00444 }
00445 
00447 template <unsigned R1, unsigned C1, unsigned R2, unsigned C2> inline
00448 void set_region( MsqMatrix<R1,C1>& d,
00449                  unsigned r, unsigned c, 
00450                  MsqMatrix<R2,C2>& s )
00451 {
00452   const unsigned rmax = r+R2 > R1 ? R1 : r+R2;
00453   const unsigned cmax = c+C2 > C1 ? C1 : c+C2;
00454   for (unsigned i = r; i < rmax; ++i)
00455     for (unsigned j = c; j < cmax; ++j)
00456       d(i,j) = s(i-r,j-c);
00457 }

00460 template <unsigned R, unsigned C> inline
00461 MsqMatrix<R,C>& MsqMatrix<R,C>::assign_add_transpose( const MsqMatrix<C,R>& other )
00462 {
00463   for (unsigned r = 0; r < R; ++r)
00464     for (unsigned c = 0; c < C; ++c)
00465       operator()(r,c) += other(c,r);
00466   return *this;
00467 }

00470 MsqMatrix<R,C>& MsqMatrix<R,C>::assign_multiply_elements( const MsqMatrix<R,C>& other )
00471   { for (unsigned i = 0; i < R*C; ++i)  m[i] *= other.data()[i]; return *this; }

00528 template <unsigned R, unsigned C> inline
00529 MsqMatrix<R,C> operator-( const MsqMatrix<R,C>& m, double s )
00530   { MsqMatrix<R,C> tmp(m); tmp -= s; return tmp; }
00531 
00532 template <unsigned R, unsigned C> inline
00533 MsqMatrix<R,C> operator-( double s, const MsqMatrix<R,C>& m )
00534   { MsqMatrix<R,C> tmp(m); tmp -= s; return tmp; }
00535 
00536 template <unsigned R, unsigned C> inline
00537 MsqMatrix<R,C> operator-( const MsqMatrix<R,C>& A, const MsqMatrix<R,C>& B )
00538   { MsqMatrix<R,C> tmp(A); tmp -= B; return tmp; }
00539

00541 template <unsigned R, unsigned C> inline
00542 MsqMatrix<R,C> operator*( const MsqMatrix<R,C>& m, double s )
00543   { MsqMatrix<R,C> tmp(m); tmp *= s; return tmp; }
00544 
00545 template <unsigned R, unsigned C> inline
00546 MsqMatrix<R,C> operator*( double s, const MsqMatrix<R,C>& m )
00547   { MsqMatrix<R,C> tmp(m); tmp *= s; return tmp; }
00548 
00549 template <unsigned R, unsigned RC, unsigned C> inline
00550 double multiply_helper_result_val( unsigned r, unsigned c,
00551                                    const MsqMatrix<R,RC>& A,
00552                                    const MsqMatrix<RC,C>& B )
00553 {
00554   double tmp = A(r,0)*B(0,c);
00555   switch (RC) {
00556     default: for (unsigned k = 6; k < RC; ++k)
00557             tmp += A(r,k)*B(k,c);
00558     case 6: tmp += A(r,5)*B(5,c);
00559     case 5: tmp += A(r,4)*B(4,c);
00560     case 4: tmp += A(r,3)*B(3,c);
00561     case 3: tmp += A(r,2)*B(2,c);
00562     case 2: tmp += A(r,1)*B(1,c);
00563     case 1: ;
00564   }
00565   return tmp;
00566 }
00567 
00568 template <unsigned R, unsigned RC, unsigned C> inline
00569 MsqMatrix<R,C> operator*( const MsqMatrix<R,RC>& A, const MsqMatrix<RC,C>& B )
00570 {
00571   //MsqMatrix<R,C> result(0.0);
00572   //for (unsigned i = 0; i < R; ++i)
00573   //  for (unsigned j = 0; j < C; ++j)
00574   //    for (unsigned k = 0; k < RC; ++k)
00575   //      result(i,j) += A(i,k) * B(k,j);
00576  
00577   MsqMatrix<R,C> result;
00578   for (unsigned r = 0; r < R; ++r)
00579     for (unsigned c = 0; c < C; ++c)
00580       result(r,c) = multiply_helper_result_val( r, c, A, B );
00581   
00582   return result;
00583 }

00586 template <unsigned R, unsigned C> inline
00587 MsqMatrix<R,C> operator/( const MsqMatrix<R,C>& m, double s )
00588   { MsqMatrix<R,C> tmp(m); tmp /= s; return tmp; }
00589 
00590 template <unsigned RC> inline
00591 double cofactor( const MsqMatrix<RC,RC>& m, unsigned r, unsigned c )
00592 {
00593   const double sign[] = { 1.0, -1.0 };
00594   return sign[(r+c)%2] * det( MsqMatrix<RC-1,RC-1>( m, r, c ) );
00595 }
00596 
00597 template <unsigned RC> inline
00598 double det( const MsqMatrix<RC,RC>& m )
00599 {
00600   double result = 0.0;
00601   for (unsigned i = 0; i < RC; ++i) 
00602     result += m(0,i) * cofactor<RC>( m, 0, i );
00603   return result;
00604 }
00605 
00606 //inline 
00607 //double det( const MsqMatrix<1,1>& m )
00608 //  { return m(0,0); }
00609 
00610 inline 
00611 double det( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& m )
00612   { return m(0,0)*m(1,1) - m(0,1)*m(1,0); }
00613 
00614 inline
00615 double det( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& m )
00616   { return m(0,0)*(m(1,1)*m(2,2) - m(2,1)*m(1,2))
00617          + m(0,1)*(m(2,0)*m(1,2) - m(1,0)*m(2,2))
00618          + m(0,2)*(m(1,0)*m(2,1) - m(2,0)*m(1,1)); }
00619 
00620 inline
00621 MsqMatrix<2,2> adj( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& m )
00622 {
00623   MsqMatrix<2,2> result;
00624   result(0,0) =  m(1,1);
00625   result(0,1) = -m(0,1);
00626   result(1,0) = -m(1,0);
00627   result(1,1) =  m(0,0);
00628   return result;
00629 }
00630 
00631 inline
00632 MsqMatrix<2,2> transpose_adj( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& m )
00633 {
00634   MsqMatrix<2,2> result;
00635   result(0,0) =  m(1,1);
00636   result(1,0) = -m(0,1);
00637   result(0,1) = -m(1,0);
00638   result(1,1) =  m(0,0);
00639   return result;
00640 }
00641 
00642 inline
00643 MsqMatrix<3,3> adj( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& m )
00644 {
00645   MsqMatrix<3,3> result;
00646   
00647   result(0,0) = m(1,1)*m(2,2) - m(1,2)*m(2,1);
00648   result(0,1) = m(0,2)*m(2,1) - m(0,1)*m(2,2);
00649   result(0,2) = m(0,1)*m(1,2) - m(0,2)*m(1,1);
00650   
00651   result(1,0) = m(1,2)*m(2,0) - m(1,0)*m(2,2);
00652   result(1,1) = m(0,0)*m(2,2) - m(0,2)*m(2,0);
00653   result(1,2) = m(0,2)*m(1,0) - m(0,0)*m(1,2);
00654   
00655   result(2,0) = m(1,0)*m(2,1) - m(1,1)*m(2,0);
00656   result(2,1) = m(0,1)*m(2,0) - m(0,0)*m(2,1);
00657   result(2,2) = m(0,0)*m(1,1) - m(0,1)*m(1,0);
00658   
00659   return result;
00660 }
00661 
00662 inline
00663 MsqMatrix<3,3> transpose_adj( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& m )
00664 {
00665   MsqMatrix<3,3> result;
00666   
00667   result(0,0) = m(1,1)*m(2,2) - m(1,2)*m(2,1);
00668   result(0,1) = m(1,2)*m(2,0) - m(1,0)*m(2,2);
00669   result(0,2) = m(1,0)*m(2,1) - m(1,1)*m(2,0);
00670   
00671   result(1,0) = m(0,2)*m(2,1) - m(0,1)*m(2,2);
00672   result(1,1) = m(0,0)*m(2,2) - m(0,2)*m(2,0);
00673   result(1,2) = m(0,1)*m(2,0) - m(0,0)*m(2,1);
00674   
00675   result(2,0) = m(0,1)*m(1,2) - m(0,2)*m(1,1);
00676   result(2,1) = m(0,2)*m(1,0) - m(0,0)*m(1,2);
00677   result(2,2) = m(0,0)*m(1,1) - m(0,1)*m(1,0);
00678   
00679   return result;
00680 }
00681 
00682 template <unsigned R, unsigned C> inline
00683 MsqMatrix<R,C> inverse( const MsqMatrix<R,C>& m )
00684 {
00685   return adj(m) * (1.0 / det(m));
00686 }
00687 
00688 template <unsigned R, unsigned C> inline
00689 MsqMatrix<R,C> transpose( const MsqMatrix<C,R>& m )
00690 {
00691   MsqMatrix<R,C> result;
00692   for (unsigned r = 0; r < R; ++r)
00693     for (unsigned c = 0; c < C; ++c)
00694       result(r,c) = m(c,r);
00695   return result;
00696 }
00697 /*
00698 template <unsigned R> inline
00699 const MsqMatrix<R,1>& transpose( const MsqMatrix<1,R>& m )
00700   { return *reinterpret_cast<const MsqMatrix<R,1>*>(&m); }
00701 
00702 template <unsigned C> inline
00703 const MsqMatrix<1,C>& transpose( const MsqMatrix<C,1>& m )
00704   { return *reinterpret_cast<const MsqMatrix<1,C>*>(&m); }
00705 */
00706 template <unsigned RC> inline
00707 double trace( const MsqMatrix<RC,RC>& m )
00708 {
00709   double result = m(0,0);
00710   for (unsigned i = 1; i < RC; ++i)
00711     result += m(i,i);
00712   return result;
00713 }
00714 
00715 template <unsigned R, unsigned C> inline
00716 double sqr_Frobenius( const MsqMatrix<R,C>& m )
00717 {
00718   double result = *m.data() * *m.data();
00719   for (unsigned i = 1; i < R*C; ++i)
00720     result += m.data()[i] * m.data()[i];
00721   return result;
00722 }
00723 
00724 template <unsigned R, unsigned C> inline
00725 double Frobenius( const MsqMatrix<R,C>& m )
00726   { return std::sqrt( sqr_Frobenius<R,C>( m ) ); }
00727 
00728 template <unsigned R, unsigned C> inline
00729 bool operator==( const MsqMatrix<R,C>& A, const MsqMatrix<R,C>& B ) 
00730 {
00731   for (unsigned i = 0; i < R*C; ++i)
00732     if (A.data()[i] != B.data()[i])
00733       return false;
00734   return true;
00735 }
00736 
00737 template <unsigned R, unsigned C> inline
00738 bool operator!=( const MsqMatrix<R,C>& A, const MsqMatrix<R,C>& B ) 
00739   { return !(A == B); }
00740 
00741 template <unsigned R, unsigned C> inline
00742 std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& str, const MsqMatrix<R,C>& m )
00743 {
00744   str << m.data()[0];
00745   for (unsigned i = 1; i < R*C; ++i)
00746     str << ' ' << m.data()[i];
00747   return str;
00748 }
00749 
00750 template <unsigned R, unsigned C> inline
00751 std::istream& operator>>( std::istream& str, MsqMatrix<R,C>& m )
00752 {
00753   for (unsigned i = 0; i < R*C; ++i)
00754     str >> m.data()[i];
00755   return str;
00756 }

00758 template <unsigned R> inline
00759 double sqr_length( const MsqMatrix<R,1>& v )
00760   { return sqr_Frobenius(v); }
00761 
00762 template <unsigned C> inline
00763 double sqr_length( const MsqMatrix<1,C>& v )
00764   { return sqr_Frobenius(v); }
00765 
00766 template <unsigned R> inline
00767 double length( const MsqMatrix<R,1>& v )
00768   { return Frobenius(v); }
00769 
00770 template <unsigned C> inline
00771 double length( const MsqMatrix<1,C>& v )
00772   { return Frobenius(v); }
00773 
00774 template <unsigned R, unsigned C> inline
00775 double inner_product( const MsqMatrix<R,C>& m1, const MsqMatrix<R,C>& m2 )
00776 {
00777   double result = 0.0;
00778   for (unsigned r = 0; r < R; ++r)
00779     for (unsigned c = 0; c < C; ++c)
00780       result += m1(r,c) * m2(r,c);
00781   return result;
00782 }
00783 
00784 template <unsigned R, unsigned C> inline
00785 MsqMatrix<R,C> outer( const MsqMatrix<R,1>& v1, const MsqMatrix<C,1>& v2 )
00786 {
00787   MsqMatrix<R,C> result;
00788   for (unsigned r = 0; r < R; ++r)
00789     for (unsigned c = 0; c < C; ++c)
00790       result(r,c) = v1(r,0) * v2(c,0);
00791   return result;
00792 }
00793 
00794 template <unsigned R, unsigned C> inline
00795 MsqMatrix<R,C> outer( const MsqMatrix<1,R>& v1, const MsqMatrix<1,C>& v2 )
00796 {
00797   MsqMatrix<R,C> result;
00798   for (unsigned r = 0; r < R; ++r)
00799     for (unsigned c = 0; c < C; ++c)
00800       result(r,c) = v1(0,r) * v2(0,c);
00801   return result;
00802 }
00803 
00804 inline
00805 double vector_product( const MsqMatrix<2,1>& v1, const MsqMatrix<2,1>& v2 )
00806   { return v1(0,0) * v2(1,0) - v1(1,0) * v2(0,0); }
00807 
00808 inline
00809 double vector_product( const MsqMatrix<1,2>& v1, const MsqMatrix<1,2>& v2 )
00810   { return v1(0,0) * v2(0,1) - v1(0,1) * v2(0,0); }
00811 
00812 inline
00813 MsqMatrix<3,1> vector_product( const MsqMatrix<3,1>& a, const MsqMatrix<3,1>& b )
00814 {
00815   MsqMatrix<3,1> result;
00816   result(0,0) = a(1,0)*b(2,0) - a(2,0)*b(1,0);
00817   result(1,0) = a(2,0)*b(0,0) - a(0,0)*b(2,0);
00818   result(2,0) = a(0,0)*b(1,0) - a(1,0)*b(0,0);
00819   return result;
00820 }
00821 
00822 inline
00823 MsqMatrix<1,3> vector_product( const MsqMatrix<1,3>& a, const MsqMatrix<1,3>& b )
00824 {
00825   MsqMatrix<1,3> result;
00826   result(0,0) = a(0,1)*b(0,2) - a(0,2)*b(0,1);
00827   result(0,1) = a(0,2)*b(0,0) - a(0,0)*b(0,2);
00828   result(0,2) = a(0,0)*b(0,1) - a(0,1)*b(0,0);
00829   return result;
00830 }
00831 
00832 template <unsigned R, unsigned C> inline
00833 double operator%( const MsqMatrix<R,C>& v1, const MsqMatrix<R,C>& v2 )
00834   { return inner_product( v1, v2 ); }
00835 
00836 inline
00837 double operator*( const MsqMatrix<2,1>& v1, const MsqMatrix<2,1>& v2 )
00838   { return vector_product( v1, v2 ); }
00839 
00840 inline
00841 double operator*( const MsqMatrix<1,2>& v1, const MsqMatrix<1,2>& v2 )
00842   { return vector_product( v1, v2 ); }
00843 
00844 inline
00845 MsqMatrix<3,1> operator*( const MsqMatrix<3,1>& v1, const MsqMatrix<3,1>& v2 )
00846   { return vector_product( v1, v2 ); }
00847 
00848 inline
00849 MsqMatrix<1,3> operator*( const MsqMatrix<1,3>& v1, const MsqMatrix<1,3>& v2 )
00850   { return vector_product( v1, v2 ); }
00851 
00853 inline
00854 void QR( const MsqMatrix<3,3>& A, MsqMatrix<3,3>& Q, MsqMatrix<3,3>& R )
00855 {
00856     Q = A;
00857 
00858     R(0,0) = sqrt(Q(0,0)*Q(0,0) + Q(1,0)*Q(1,0) + Q(2,0)*Q(2,0));
00859     double temp_dbl = 1.0/R(0,0);
00860     R(1,0) = 0.0;
00861     R(2,0) = 0.0;
00862     Q(0,0) *= temp_dbl;
00863     Q(1,0) *= temp_dbl;
00864     Q(2,0) *= temp_dbl;
00865     
00866 
00867     R(0,1)  = Q(0,0)*Q(0,1) + Q(1,0)*Q(1,1) + Q(2,0)*Q(2,1);
00868     Q(0,1) -= Q(0,0)*R(0,1);
00869     Q(1,1) -= Q(1,0)*R(0,1);
00870     Q(2,1) -= Q(2,0)*R(0,1);
00871 
00872     R(0,2)  = Q(0,0)*Q(0,2) + Q(1,0)*Q(1,2) + Q(2,0)*Q(2,2);
00873     Q(0,2) -= Q(0,0)*R(0,2);
00874     Q(1,2) -= Q(1,0)*R(0,2);
00875     Q(2,2) -= Q(2,0)*R(0,2);
00876 
00877     R(1,1) = sqrt(Q(0,1)*Q(0,1) + Q(1,1)*Q(1,1) + Q(2,1)*Q(2,1));
00878     temp_dbl = 1.0 / R(1,1);
00879     R(2,1) = 0.0;
00880     Q(0,1) *= temp_dbl;
00881     Q(1,1) *= temp_dbl;
00882     Q(2,1) *= temp_dbl;
00883 
00884     
00885     R(1,2)  = Q(0,1)*Q(0,2) + Q(1,1)*Q(1,2) + Q(2,1)*Q(2,2);
00886     Q(0,2) -= Q(0,1)*R(1,2);
00887     Q(1,2) -= Q(1,1)*R(1,2);
00888     Q(2,2) -= Q(2,1)*R(1,2);
00889   
00890     R(2,2) = sqrt(Q(0,2)*Q(0,2) + Q(1,2)*Q(1,2) + Q(2,2)*Q(2,2));
00891     temp_dbl = 1.0 / R(2,2);
00892     Q(0,2) *= temp_dbl;
00893     Q(1,2) *= temp_dbl;
00894     Q(2,2) *= temp_dbl;
00895 }
00896 
00897 
00899 inline
00900 void QR( const MsqMatrix<2,2>& A, MsqMatrix<2,2>& Q, MsqMatrix<2,2>& R )
00901 {
00902     R(0,0) = std::sqrt( A(0,0)*A(0,0) + A(1,0)*A(1,0) );
00903     const double r0inv = 1.0 / R(0,0);
00904     Q(0,0) = Q(1,1) = A(0,0) * r0inv;
00905     Q(1,0) = A(1,0) * r0inv;
00906     Q(0,1) = -Q(1,0);
00907     R(0,1) = r0inv * (A(0,0)*A(0,1) + A(1,0)*A(1,1));
00908     R(1,1) = r0inv * (A(0,0)*A(1,1) - A(0,1)*A(1,0));
00909     R(1,0) = 0.0;
00910 }
